categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Hara was a Keshiri female who served the Sith of the Lost Tribe under the command of the Sith Saber Querdan Dei.

As a non-force-sensitive, she served as a pilot and deputy onboard the Cryptic Warning. Hara turned on as the most likely target, and prepared to land in the planet Klatooine. Since the adoption of the Sith proved to be correct, Hara landed near a warehouse until she was involved in a fight between Dei and Leia Organa Solo, who was protecting Allana Solo.
